content:
Great to see you all tonight! I really appreciate hearing the pro advice . @Tanmay Sharma you should be good to go "hack away".

Here are my take aways as I evaluate scale:
-Docker isn't the only "containerization" tool in town.
-Evaluate load testing!
-Look closely at db read / writes (stay cautious of ORMs)

Please share any other advice, links etc...

PS - @Philip Durbin we forgot the group picture!!
Ha. One thought on Docker is that @Alexander Karelas recently Dockerized his app. You can read his story and see the code at #perl > links.gandalf.gr
For load testing, we use Locust at work, as described in our dev guide.
